text:
e="preserve">Siv Widerberg (12 June 1931 – 24 December 2020) was a Swedish writer and journalist. She received "doctor honoris causa" from the University of Umeå. She was born in Bromma, Sweden. She was a member of the Swedish Academy for Children's Books.
Widerberg died on 24 December 2020 in Stockholm, aged 89.
